Package com.g1.mychess.auth.global

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.auth.global.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
Global exception handler for the application. Handles various custom exceptions and returns appropriate HTTP responses.
